Training Results
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: Misc. Q&A (post all new topics here, we'll make more sections later): Training Results
By Thorr on Monday, October 15, 2007 - 08:07 am:

There are 5 possible results when training your monster on drills at the farm.

Hi Success
Success
Success?
Mental Failure
Physical Failure

Here are the results of Praise/Scolding for deviations from Success

LeniencyLoyaltyMoraleStressSensitivity
Hi Success
Praise1+1+2+2-1+
No Praise2-002+1-
Mental FailureSuccess?
Scold2-1+2+2+1+
No Scold2+1-02-1-
Physical Failure
Scold2-1-2-3+1+
No Scold2+01+3-1-

By GM on Monday, October 15, 2007 - 10:25 am:

Based on these values, it seems that Mental Failure and Physical
Failure equate to the failures from the previous games in which the
monster was lax and/or chickened out and was unable to complete
the training, but put an effort, respectively, whereas Success?
equates to Cheat. They make it pretty clear regardless of whether
or not you skip the training skit, so it's easy to tell.

By Thorr on Monday, October 15, 2007 - 10:43 am:

The book lists likely reasons for Physical Failure being -
Slow Growth
Over-fatigued
Low aptitude for that Stat
